the card only has DVI outputs and its connected to the monitor over HDMI so DVI-HDMI
Could anyone help me with that issue?
i need help fixing this  if i cant fix this in 24 hours im going to fedora =P
dvi-hdmi conversion can often be a problem
check (use the xorg log) what modes your monitor is advertising (is it a monitor or a TV)
what graphics drives are you using
using the xorg log file, what modes is your monitor advertising ?
using the screen resolution tool, what modes are available ?
can you also verify they are using the nvidia drivers ?
can you confirm it's using the Nvidia drivers in the xorg conf
interesting, I'd disable twinview (unless you are using 2 monitors)
have you tried the nvidia-settings tool ?
try using it to configure the card
is the nvidia kernel module loaded ?
